name: Super Euchre!
description:
Euchre needs no explanation to those who love it. Super Euchre! brings the magic of the game to life in your hand just like you were playing with your best friends. Nines and Tens, Ace No Face – your favorite game options are ready for you to play.

Waiting in a line, sitting on a train, plane, bus or just bored at work… you need Super Euchre!
